Specifications.I/O Slots: VGA Port- 1 standard (rear), Serial Port- 1 optional (rear), Network Port (RJ-45)- 2 x 1 Gb ports as standard (rear, 1 shared for HPE iLO), Dedicated iLO Management Port (RJ-45)- 1 optional (rear), USB 3.0 Port- 6 (1 front, 4 rear, 1 internal), USB 2.0 Port- 1 (1 front), MicroSD Slot- Optional via HPE 32GB microSD RAID1 USB Boot Device
